title: Lunar Wraith Morgana

embed.description: It may be a Saturday but the PBE has been updated! Today's update includes new Caitlyn, Morgana, and Wukong skins! Continue reading for more information! ( Warning: PBE Content is tentative and iterative - what you see may not reflect what eventually gets pushed to live servers! Manage your expectations accordingly.

body: Hi there! I'm not on PBE so obviously i can't play this skin as is. I know it was just announced but looking at the video preview of the skin i had a question for KateyKhaos if she sees this. The skin is really beautiful - the animation on the Q is fantastic. As a Morg lover, I really enjoy the look and feel of this thematic and think it suits her very well. That said, at 1350 I was expecting some level of voice processing. Given that she's supposed to be a "wraith" wouldn't it have been appropriate to give her a little bit of a ghostly echo or something? I realize not all 1350 skins get this treatment, but for a thematic that seems to specifically want her to be ethereal and creepy, I would've thought this would be a very clear opportunity to enhance the them with a voice filter. Can you shine any light on this decision?

replies.body:
Hey GwingMaster,

For this particular skin, we felt her base VO fit appropriately with this skin. That said, she's not meant to be etherea, per se. Lunar Wraith skins are meant to represent darkness, which then fights against Radiant, which is symbolic of light.
So will there be more Radiant skins?
It's certainly possible! I personally think it's a cool alternative to Warring Kingdoms - it's another cool thematic we can add to Lunar Revel.
Seems like it clashes with the arclight skin line though.  Course I might be looking at it wrong.

What would other radiant skins look like?
Would they be based on characters from the journey of the west?
Would they simply look similar(making the champ look like some god)?
Or would we get a radiant skin for a champ who can represent the zodiac of the year?(next year would be the year of the rooster,so swain or azir would make sense)

Personally I like the last idea the most(even though cassiopeia got already a yade-fang-skin in the year of the snake) as i was a bit disappointed that hecarim didn't get a lunar skin in the year of the horse(samurai hecarim where D:?)
Does this mean you aren't planning on changing it? I feel like the feedback on that particular skin has been overwhelmingly negative. But I guess the forums are just a segment of the community.

We won't be adding VO processing, no. 

We have, however, adjusted her price to 975 RP based on some feedback. In addition, you'll be seeing some texture tweaks with the next PBE update (mostly with her dress).
I'm glad to hear that. I think that the dark binding looks nice. Maybe consider adding that wolf-like particle to other parts of her kit? I think that would help ^^

>
> We won't be adding VO processing, no. 
> 
> We have, however, adjusted her price to 975 RP based on some feedback. In addition, you'll be seeing some texture tweaks with the next PBE update (mostly with her dress).

You missed a golden opportunity to name them "Dire" and I am disappointed. {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} 

Katey pls

Hey Katey! It made me sad to see so much negative reaction from people about this skin. I love Morg and was going to insta-buy it at 1350 because I think she looks gorgeous and I'll probably play this skin the most next season.  

I did have a slight suggestion for her splash art -which is also beautiful. Given her general poise and posture, wouldn't a slight smirk make her just a tiny bit more "I've done evil and you can't do anything about it?" I don't have the photoshop skills to make a mock up, but I think it would fit her theme there.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=L9tQqYV8,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-01-04T23:07:39.053+0000)
>
> Hey GwingMaster,
> 
> For this particular skin, we felt her base VO fit appropriately with this skin. That said, she's not meant to be etherea, per se. Lunar Wraith skins are meant to represent darkness, which then fights against Radiant, which is symbolic of light.

The price reduction seems like a very fair compromise on this VO thing, so thanks for that and for the explanation! As I said before, I think it's a cool thematic for her so i'm excited!!

I find it interesting that her primary theme point is "darkness". To me, the term "Lunar" doesn't imply darkness, so much as a different kind of light. Sort of how I've always felt about Diana vs Leona - Diana isn't darkness the way, say, Nocturne is, but rather a different side of the same coin. "Lunar Wraith" to me implies something more akin to a sly, or mischievous spirit with ill intentions - contrasting to "Radiant' which sounds stalwart, bold, and honorable.

Well, the price went down, the skin on the pbe now costs 975 rp instead of 1350. 

So there's that, she's not gonna have a VO filter for sure now.
